item.title: about
item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science, Peking University. Before joining Peking University in 2017, I was a postdoc in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Pennsylvania State University. I received the PhD degree from Nanyang Technological University in 2014, master and bachelor degrees from Southeast University. Interests Learning to Cooperate Mobile/Edge AI Systems I am looking for self-motivated undergraduate students for research internships.
